TypedProperties - Class in org.freehep.properties
TypedProperties is similar to java.util.Properties but allows for storage of "typed" elements rather than just Strings.
TypedProperties(TypedProperties, String) - Constructor for class org.freehep.properties.TypedProperties
Creates TypedProperties not associated to a file, for usage inside other TypedProperties.
